GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles with total comments, can filter by topic and sort and order by article properties

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article selected by id with comment count

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comment.description: posts a new comment to an article when provided username and body - username and article id must be valid

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates article votes when supplied with {int_votes: newVote} where newVote is a positive or negative integer

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment with given comment id from comments database

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: returns a single user matching the specified username
